verbs.description: I [V: could] rewrite the letter from Trump to Kim but I wo n’t waste my time . It is a travesty on several levels ( noted in my Tweet above ) . Hearing Mike Pompeo read it out loud made me cringe . If I was teaching a class in diplomatic writing I 'd send it back ...
